DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess safety , tolerability immunogenicity Fluzone® vaccine four dose level JVRS-100 adjuvant compare Fluzone® vaccine alone healthy adult 18-49 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Fluzone® Vaccine Combined With Different Doses JVRS-100 Adjuvant
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose trial evaluate safety tolerability grade , ascend dos JVRS-100 adjuvant administer combination vaccine antigen .
